meta-review.comment: Qomp2 takes the classic Pong and spins it into a delightful puzzle adventure. The game's innovative mechanics and creative level design make each bounce a joy, but beware of potential frustration due to its peculiar movement scheme. While it may lack real replay value, Qomp2 deserves a spot in your gaming lineup for its refreshing twist on a beloved classic and sleek, intuitive gameplay.
